text: alt=The cover shows a woman taking off her school uniform, baring her shoulders and breasts. is an anime adaptation of 5pb.'s video game of the same name. The series was directed by Masato Jinbo at Silver Link, and aired in Japan from January to March 2017; it was followed by the theatrical film Chaos;Child: Silent Sky in June 2017, which adapts the game's ending. ==Episode list== {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%; margin:auto; background:#FFF;" |- style="border-bottom: 3px solid #CCF;" ! style="width:3em;" | No. !
